name: INFile
desc: An object that describes a file.

items.name: init(data: Data, filename: String, typeIdentifier: String?)
items.desc: Creates a new file object with the specified data and identifier.

items.name: init(fileURL: URL, filename: String?, typeIdentifier: String?)
items.desc: Creates a new file object with the specified URL and identifier.

items.name: var data: Data
items.desc: The data associated with a file.

items.name: var fileURL: URL?
items.desc: The URL that describes the location of the file.
